variable.name: PY145

variable.name: PY146
variable.description: WHEN I GET ANGRY I SAY NASTY THINGS. [RAGE SCALE]

variable.name: PY147

variable.name: PY149
variable.description: I FEEL INFURIATED WHEN I DO A GOOD JOB AND GET A POOR EVALUATION. [RAGE SCALE]

variable.name: PY150
variable.description: I HAVE OFTEN MET PEOPLE WHO WERE SUPPOSED TO BE EXPERTS WHO WERE NO BETTER THAN I. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY151
variable.description: I WOULD CERTAINLY ENJOY BEATING A CROOK AT HIS OWN GAME. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY152
variable.description: I HAVE AT TIMES HAD TO BE ROUGH WITH PEOPLE WHO WERE RUDE OR ANNOYING. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY153
variable.description: WHEN A MAN IS WITH A WOMAN, HE IS USUALLY THINKING ABOUT THINGS PERTAINING TO THE WOMAN'S SEX. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY154
variable.description: I TRY TO COVER UP MY POOR OPINION OR PITY OF A PERSON SO THAT HE/SHE WILL NOT KNOW HOW I FEEL. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY155
variable.description: I HAVE FREQUENTLY WORKED UNDER PEOPLE WHO SEEM TO HAVE THINGS ARRANGED SO THAT THEY GET CREDIT FOR GOOD WORK BUT ARE ABLE TO PASS OFF MISTAKES ONTO THOSE UNDER THEM. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY156
variable.description: I HAVE OFTEN HAD TO TAKE ORDERS FROM SOMEONE WHO DID NOT KNOW AS MUCH AS I DID. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY157
variable.description: SOME OF MY FAMILY HAVE HABITS THAT BOTHER AND ANNOY ME VERY MUCH. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY158
variable.description: A LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE ARE GUILTY OF BAD SEXUAL CONDUCT. [HOSTILITY SCALE]

variable.name: PY163
variable.description: WHEN YOU ARE REALLY ANGRY OR ANNOYED, HOW LIKELY ARE YOU TO GET NERVOUS OR SHAKY? [SYMPTOMS OF ANGER SCALE]

variable.name: PY164

variable.name: PY165

RARELY OR NONE OF THE TIME (LESS THAN ONE DAY)

MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

variable.name: PY210

variable.description: ON A SCALE FROM 1 TO 7, HOW DISRUPTIVE IS WORKING TO YOUR HOME LIFE?
variable.value: HAS NOT BEEN AT ALL DISRUPTIVE
